name: TinyCity - Fight vs Traffic Jams
description:
Goal is simple: Build your dream city and get rich asap!

How to get rich? Build Residential, Commercial and Industrial buildings and make sure, they are distributed well to support all the traffic they generate! Each car will generate income on arrival.

Controls: Mouse and Left Click.

Play time: A minute or two.

Made in 48hrs - give or take... (incl. a bit thinking time...)

Did you beat it? What's your best time? Would love to hear, what you think about it!
